usrmsg_err.L1001_userInactive: Your account is currently inactive. Please contact the Help Desk to activate
usrmsg_err.L1002_userLocked: Your credentials have been locked. Please contact the Help Desk to unlock the credentials
usrmsg_err.L1007_invalidclientid: Customer ID is invalid. Access denied

usrmsg_info.L7007_passwordTooltip:
Enter the password.
The password must have from 8 to 10 characters.
The characters allowed are letters, numbers, and the symbols dot (.), Underline (_) and the minus sign (-)
The password must contain at least one letter, one symbol among those admitted, a capital letter and a small letter

sysmsg_err.L11001_databaseDisconnected: An error occurred while connecting to Database
